Description.val:
Beginning in FY18 this funding line represents a consolidation of ammunition line items by functional capability. 
The family of mortar cartridges includes all 60mm mortar cartridges and 81mm mortar cartridges which consist of high explosive, smoke, illumination and full range training practice rounds.  The 60mm mortar cartridges are fired from the M224 lightweight mortar system to provide close-in indirect fire support of group troops at ranges of approximately 70 to 3,500 meters.  The 81mm mortar cartridges are fired from the M252 medium weight mortar system to provide long-range indirect fire support to infantry units at ranges of approximately 100 to 6,000 meters.

Funds prior to FY18 are contained in line items 1083 and 1091.

Justification.val:
FY 2019 Baseline funding will procure 60mm Full Range Training Practice Cartridges (DODIC BA15) and 81mm (DODIC C875) Full Range Practice Cartridges (FRPC) in support of baseline training munitions requirements for lightweight mortar systems. Additionally, FY 2019 Baseline funding supports procurement of 81MM High Explosive rounds (DODIC CA62).

OCO: 
FY19 OCO funding supports reset munitions expended in theater in support of Operation Inherent Resolve (OIR).
